overview: Tir√©sias has been shot in 2014, during a residency involving three French Art centers, based in the central Pyrenees region. The script is the result of this producing method, and suggested the idea of a shape-shifter protagonist that psychologically and bodily changes according to the locations.The character's body becomes, more and more, a polical manifesto; it embodies all the characteristics of all the social outcasts.
title: Tiresias
